sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiàzài zhège ruǎnjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez télécharger ce logiciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please download this software.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jìhuà yǒu sān xiàng nèiróng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plan comporte trois points.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This plan has three items.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xiāngzi bān dào fángjiān lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez apporter la valise dans la chambre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please carry the box into the room.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen quánjiā de xiàngpiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une photo de toute notre famille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a photo of our whole family.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìshí qiàqià xiāngfǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réalité est tout à fait le contraire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The facts are quite the opposite.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wúfǎ xiǎngxiàng nà zhǒng qíngkuàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas imaginer cette situation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I cannot imagine that situation.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要综合考虑各种因素。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zōnghé kǎolǜ gè zhǒng yīnsù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons prendre en compte tous les facteurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to consider all factors comprehensively.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī xiāng shuǐguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai acheté une caisse de fruits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a box of fruit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào tígāo gōngzuò xiàolǜ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons améliorer l'efficacité du travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must improve work efficiency.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè xiǎoxíng huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une petite réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a small meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yīxiē shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner un peu d'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me some water.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīnláng chuānzhe xīzhuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le marié porte un costume.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The groom is wearing a suit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē shūcài hěn xīnxiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces légumes sont très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These vegetables are very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息，他非常兴奋。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, tā fēicháng xīngfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En entendant cette nouvelle, il était très excité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hearing this news, he was very excited.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wúfǎ xíngróng wǒ de gǎnshòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas décrire mes sentiments.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I cannot describe my feelings.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mùqián de xíngshì hěn fùzá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation actuelle est très complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The current situation is very complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì yīnyuè hěn yǒu xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très intéressé par la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very interested in music.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè kuǎn chē shì zuìxīn xíng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette voiture est du dernier modèle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This car is the latest model.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī zhǒng xīnxíng de cáiliào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un nouveau type de matériau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a new type of material.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang liù diǎn xǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me réveille à six heures chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I wake up at six o'clock every morning.
